name: 死亡禁地 The Dead Zone
name_original: 死亡禁地 The Dead Zone
description:
Game Introduction

This is a third person survival shooting game, without cumbersome systems and abandoning complex operations, allowing players to quickly adapt to the game rhythm, thereby fully exploring and experiencing the sense of relaxation and decompression brought by the game itself.

You will control the soldiers who survived the disaster... In a world that has turned into apocalypse, explore those challenging death zones, collect advice to unlock the "hidden plot", and in order to defend the continuation of human civilization, kill all those so-called monsters!!!

Summon to the death penalty area already occupied by infected individuals through unknown signals.
While identifying the source of the signal, gather as many items as possible to survive and arm oneself
Explore the survival strongholds, occupied factories, abandoned construction buildings, abandoned docks, and other death zones in this world.
Find the truth of the disaster and lead the survivors to survive in this disaster...

Manipulative role
